Custom metadata is added - Developer

Events when custom metadata is added to an asset
Â¶
When custom metadata is added to an
asset
in Atlan, the following event is emitted.
BUSINESS_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE
Â¶
Atlan always emits a
BUSINESS_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE
event when custom metadata is added to an asset.
2022-11-07
2024-10-01
